column5: Acquired a new 12' as an upgrade to the 10' that I picked up off the board last spring (which will go up for sale in a few weeks). Kids were pretty excited with the new vessel which will receive its' maiden voyage for the pike opener in a local electric only lake - see you there young Jedi!  :-)
Nice. Put a 70lber thrust on there you'll get it going 10mph.
Rod....    We need to talk!  G

Nice new fishing machine !!!! those things are tougher than nails,and will handle some really serious water,and will go anywhere,and i think you should put a nice 55lb on that baby,and you will be all set...good-luck
She is powered by the first motor I ever purchased....a 1996 55lb Minn Kota.  Stronger....Longer!
Hey SS Is that an aquamarine boat? Nice, looks like is has the alumnium floor. I just picked one up also 11 ft, now to get a trolling motor for it.  Jose
someone was a good boy over the winter months...LOL
Come on Charlie.....I'm ALWAYS a good boy!
Going to go with the 250 as I don't think the 880 is compatible with our chartplotters. I will confirm with Jos.
It is... but you need the 30.00 cable.....according to Jos... I am pretty sure.  G
OK - but then I need to find three friends....

That thing looks pretty cool man, it will be perfect for conservation areas. We'll have to make the rounds: Guelph, Shade's, Valen's, Wildwood, and Mountsberg. Are you trailering or just inflating on site?
Initial plan was to inflate on site, but the damn thing is pretty heavy - combined with the fact that I'm a fat old man will most likely result in it being trailered.  :-)
Do you have seats or do you just sit on the floor?
Comes with bench seats, but not sure if they can hold KR....      Gerritt, you behave!  :-)
